mapper.select: SELECT BUYER_ID,BUYER_NAME,BUYER_LGU, BUYER_BANK,BUYER_BANKNO,BUYER_BANKNAME, BUYER_ZIP,BUYER_ADD1,BUYER_ADD2, BUYER_COMTEL,BUYER_FAX,BUYER_MAIL, BUYER_CHARGER, LPROD_ID,LPROD_GU,LPROD_NM, PROD_NAME,PROD_PRICE FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON(BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON(BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id}
mapper.insert:
